songs.lyrics:
Yeah! Yama
Nasty
Alexx
Let's go

[Verse 1]
Chhaina malai kehi pani matlab
Bhayena tero harkat, yo hoen tero circus
Nagar dherai bakbak, Khola tara marmat
Ma ubheko jamin tero lagi paat-parbat
Hiphop ko rakshak mero nam ho Yama
Sabailai haat dine rah kam ko karma
Sadhai [?] mero lagi ho karma
Charko aago sanga ithihas ko janma

[Chorus] x2
Bundai chhu ajhai ma taaj
Gardinchhu sabai ma naas
Charai tira eutai chha aawaj
Harek bihani saajh hiphop ko laash

[Verse 2]
Yo nawa yuwa huna sakchha yaha yuddha
Chaina kohi yaha suddha hoen kohi chhaina buddha
Sabai dhongi patra matra sadhai bhari jatra lagchha yaha
Kochi kaha gacha malai dhongi matra lagchha malai harauna dey
Afnai duniya ma ramauna dey
Pahile jahile ma harauda they
Aamale sodhdin kamauchas key
Bhavisya ma afulai banauchas key
Gari khana lai tah darauchas key
Ma chai jahile rap banauda they
Hip hop kai duniya ma haraudathey
Mero ragat pasina yo geet ma ni chha
Mero boli sidha ani this pani chha
Yaha scene dami chha, rap ko bimari chha
Tara jun geet ma ni hit hanincha
Kaslai diu ma dosh
Ma sanga sapana ma ni niu na khos
Bara aba kasari jiune soch
Should be on the map ani piune ho

[Chorus] x2
Bundai chhu ajhai ma taaj
Gardinchhu sabai ma naas
Charai tira eutai chha aawaj
Harek bihani saajh hiphop ko laash

[Verse 3]
Sapana ajhai puranai chha
Sapana sabai puryanai chha
Ki sapana sapai purine chha
Sapana ko nisana puranai chha
Yo sabda ko khel na gar sabda lai jhela
Sabda ma khel ani sabda lai kela
Ma shankar ko guru tah bharkhar ko chela
Gardina ma rela, na par mero fela
Ahh, mero bato chha bhinna
Jaha dushman rah sathi lai garo chha chinna
Ma bihani raat teti saaro khatinna
Tara hudaina bhaat yedi aago dankinna
Tyesaile ladhdhai chhu ma
Badhai hatai aghi badhdhai chhu ma
Naya bidhi yo gidi ma bhardai chhu ma
Purano pidhi chai sidhi ma chadhdhai chu mah

[Chorus] x2
Bundai chhu ajhai ma taaj
Gardinchhu sabai ma naas
Charai tira eutai chha aawaj
Harek bihani saajh hiphop ko laash
songs.title: Taaj
